model

Interface ModelInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountsModel, CompanyModel, CreaFattureModel, CustomersSuppliersModel, MovementsModel, ProductsModel

    public interface ModelInterface
    interfaccia che elenca i metodi comuni alle classi AccountsModel, CompanyModel,CreaFattureModel,CostumersSuppliers, MovementsModel, ProductsModel,ReceivablesPayablesModel
    Author:
    niky
